snippet: Stephen Tyrone Williams describes how music and documentaries help him prepare for a role like the one he plays in Athol Fugard’s “My Children! My Africa!”
abstract: Snapshot column with Stephen Tyrone Williams discusses how music and documentaries help him prepare for a role like the one he plays in Athol Fugard’s My Children! My Africa!
lead_paragraph: Stephen Tyrone Williams describes how music and documentaries help him prepare for a role like the one he plays in Athol Fugard’s “My Children! My Africa!”

headline.seo: Stephen Tyrone Williams of ‘My Children! My Africa!’
headline.print_headline: Finding the Tools To Carve Out a Role
